text: Hope is a city in Arkansas. It is the birthplace of former Arkansas governors Bill Clinton, who was later U.S. President, and former Governor Mike Huckabee, who unsuccessful ran for the Republican nomination in 2008 and 2016. According to the 2020 United States Census its population is 8,952. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Cities in Arkansas Category:County seats in Arkansas
title: Hope, Arkansas
